body.name: Reyee AX3000 Wi-Fi 6 Router, Dual Band Internet, 802.11ax Wireless, Coverage up to 3,000 Sq. Ft., Gigabit Wan Aggregation, WPA3, Smart VPN for Large Home (RG-E4)
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Tomorrow, February 15. Order within 37 mins
features: AX3000 Wi-Fi 6 Router: This dual-band Wi-Fi 6 router delivers Wi-Fi speeds of up to 2402 Mbps on the 5 GHz band and 574 Mbps on the 2.4 GHz band.

Better Signal: Boasting five omnidirectional antennas and five high-power FEMs, this router provides a stronger Wi-Fi signal that can penetrate through one more wall, ensuring reliable connectivity even in houses with complex layouts and diverse room types. (Coverage can reach up to 3000 square feet.)

Gaming Traffic Prioritization: Experience an enhanced gaming experience with Reyee's gaming traffic prioritization technology, which intelligently detects and optimizes gaming packets. The E4 router supports up to 128 devices.
Multi-Gig Ethernet: WAN ports can be aggregated to establish an ultra-fast Internet connection of up to 1.6 Gbps for maximum performance. Doubled throughput enables your devices to run at full speed.
One-Click Reyee Mesh: Simply press the Reyee Mesh button, Reyee's exclusive mesh algorithm significantly enhances the data transmission speed by up to 50%.
Works with: All internet service providers. A modem is required for most ISPs.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Its powerful features, expansive coverage, security measures, and reliability
reviews.reviewText: Having the Reyee AX3000 Wi-Fi 6 Router (RG-E4) in our home has significantly enhanced our internet experience. This router, released in 2023, is a powerhouse of features, making it an essential part of our tech setup.First and foremost, the dual-band capability ensures that our devices receive optimal connectivity. Whether we're streaming movies, playing online games, or video conferencing, the Wi-Fi 6 technology provides lightning-fast speeds and seamless performance. The coverage area of up to 3,000 sq. ft. ensures that every corner of our home receives a strong and stable connection, eliminating frustrating dead zones.The inclusion of Gigabit WAN Aggregation is a game-changer for us. It means that we can aggregate multiple WAN connections, maximizing our internet speed and ensuring smooth and uninterrupted browsing, even during peak usage hours. This feature has been a lifesaver, especially in a household with multiple devices constantly connected to the internet.The implementation of WPA3 security protocol provides peace of mind. Knowing that our network is safeguarded by the latest and most robust encryption technology gives us confidence in our online activities. In the age of digital threats, having this level of security is non-negotiable.The addition of Smart VPN is a feature we didn't know we needed until we had it. It allows us to establish secure connections, especially when we're accessing sensitive data remotely. It's perfect for those who work from home and need a secure channel to their office network. Plus, the ease of setting up the VPN is a huge plus, even for tech novices like us.The router's sleek design and compact size are also worth mentioning. It doesn't take up much space, and its unobtrusive appearance blends seamlessly into our home environment. It's a small detail, but it contributes to the overall aesthetics of our tech setup.Lastly, the router’s reliability is commendable. Since upgrading to the Reyee AX3000 Wi-Fi 6 Router, we've experienced minimal downtime, if any. Its stable performance has become something we can rely on day in and day out, allowing us to focus on our tasks without worrying about internet disruptions.In conclusion, the Reyee AX3000 Wi-Fi 6 Router (RG-E4) has exceeded our expectations. Its powerful features, expansive coverage, security measures, and reliability have made it an indispensable part of our home network. It's not just a router; it's a cornerstone of our connected lifestyle, ensuring that we stay connected, secure, and productive in our digital endeavors.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It was time to upgrade
reviews.reviewText: Setup was easy. Unleash the power of your internet with new equipment. Times change and so does your equipment needs. Easy setup and works really well.I'm now getting the internet I'm paying for. I needed more connections at a further distance for gaming and this was the answer to improve my experience with all devices.The picture may not seem all that impressive but I'm on wifi in a basement and I was only getting 40 mbps at one time. This is fast for wifi.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easiest set-up ever
reviews.reviewText: The only way set-up could be easier is if it un-boxed and plugged itself in. Speeds are solid. The 5ghz channel actually speed tests about 15% faster than the max speed my internet provider says I should get (don't tell spectrum). With my previous set-up I needed a router and a satellite to cover my entire house. With this router I no longer need a satellite and I have a strong signal everywhere. The dedicated channels for smart home devices are also a nice addition.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Much needed improvement
reviews.reviewText: This definitely helped to boost my wifi. I no longer lag in my mobile gaming or disconnect. The speed improvement wasn't a crazy difference but ir went from 11mbps to 18mbps, at best with the only device running it went to 20 but no more than that. Good device though!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Spent a day and a half just trying to set up the router only for it to stop working after only a few months and only displaying a solid red light and removing the password protection to my wifi and wouldn't let me put it back on let's hope I can return it

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Set up was easy and I have a lot better picture on tv now. Old one was getting weak

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Bought new router for home. I love it. Only thing was connecting to my internet was a little challenging but my internet provider helped me solve the solution

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Getting what I paid for!
reviews.reviewText: Great buy. Low price. Very easy to install , and runs 2 smart t.v's, 2 game consoles, 2 chrome books, 3 cell phones and 1 roku with no lag or or buffering.
